ComicInfo.Summary:
Marshall Stone and his crew must save their past archenemy’s daughter from the clutches of a crazed bounty hunters obsessed with an apocalyptic version of their future!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Romina Moranelli (a) & Marcelo Costa (c) | 1 | B | Variant Sketch Cover | Romina Moranelli | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Mike Norton (a) & Marcelo Costa (c) | 3 | D | Photo Cover, Limited to 1500 | Photo | 4 | E | Poster Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Magnum (a) & Marcelo Costa (c) | 5 |
